page.title: 01 GENERAL REFERENCE
page.content: In order to put our D-Block into some perspective we have decided to start our first page with a general reference to the whole Area,Where it is situated and the type of life one would expect to see here. The area is just outside the city of Dundee approx. 9km to the NW of the city.It is mainly an agricultural area consisting of many small and reasonably sized farms. The farms vary in their purpose from mixed farming through to sheep,cattle and even poultry. The specific land cover will be outlined in future pages but it may be sufficient to say that the land is sparsely populated with one or two areas more populated than others.
